staxel.village.dialogue.JamieExec.line:1: (안함)Ah, hello there.
(안함)I suppose it was you who called me out here?
(안함)No?
(안함)In that case, how can I help you?
(안함)Nothing really.
(안함)So we have this great game idea. You start off on an island after inheriting...
(안함)I see. Do let me know if you find the person who called me over.
(안함)Wait. Let me stop you right there.
(안함)Your pitching technique is abysmal!
(안함)But I'll give you a chance. Believe it or not, but I'm quite the gamer myself.
(안함)While I was waiting, I toured the island and thought up a few riddles.
(안함)If you can solve them and find me, I'll consider listening to your pitch.
(안함)Ready?
(안함)As sturdy as an oak, but not quite the same,
(안함)Good for a drink, but never a game.
(안함)Got it?
(안함)Ah! So you solved my riddle?
(안함)Was it too easy?
(안함)Very well. Try this one on for size:
(안함)A certain fanatic gave this to you.
(안함)At first it was small, but with your help it grew.
(안함)Do you know what I'm talking about?
(안함)Well now. It would seem you're quite good at this.
(안함)Then... I suppose I have one last riddle for you.
(안함)What have I got in my pocket?
(안함)...handses?
(안함)That's not a riddle!
(안함)I apologise, that was unfair.
(안함)Let's try this again.
(안함)The village, like a clockwork puzzle, ticks.
(안함)At its core, a single cog clicks.
(안함)That's all I'll say for now.
(안함)Hello again, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
(안함)My presence is merely a formality; it's ^c:1486b0;Damian^c:pop; you should be talking to.
(안함)Hello there.
(안함)Ah, thank you for taking ^c:1486b0;Damian^c:pop; off my hands for a bit.
(안함)I trust he wasn't too much of a pain?
(안함)He means well...he's just a little on the competitive side.
